contentList.content: Fire a <font color='#5bf37c'>cursed flame</font> which will fork on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and leaving a <font color='#5bf37c'>cursed fire surface</font> in its wake.

Send a cursed flame that will split on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and Scorching hit enemies.

Leaves a Necrofire surface behind.
